sector.narrative: Administrative data, registers and non-MICS household surveys and censuses

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Institutional and local actors have enhanced capacity to target, plan, and use data in monitoring and evaluation of policies, programmes and resources for the Sustainable Development Goals UNDAF/Produit 7.2 : D’ici 2023, les institutions centrales et locales, les structures nationales de statistique et d’évaluation disposent de compétences améliorées pour assurer une meilleure disponibilité et utilisation des données de qualité désagrégées, la planification, le suivi et l’évaluation des politiques et programmes publics.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the National Institute of Statistics and Demography for the finalization of the Senegal's national statistics strategy which gives the guidance on data collection needs for 2020-2024. UNICEF also supported the capacity building of 56 producers and users of social statistics, as well as the production of in-depth analysis on child relevant subjects (out-of-school children, immunization, child mortality, social protection etc.) which will support the country evidence-based programming capacity. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/02/2020

title.narrative: Nombre d'acteurs forms la collecte et l'analyse des donnes statistiques
